channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report E-2023070125
item.description:
Report E-2023070125

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-06
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal UPO experienced a UN3267 EDTA Acid Tetrasodium Salt 38% release from a 330-gallon poly tote. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 2-gallons of product released to a 4' x 10' area of the trailer floor and a 4' x 10' area of the concrete lot below due to the tote being punctured by the trailer wall. The product was transferred from the damaged tote into a new one and absorbents were deployed to clean all impacted areas. The damaged tote was then cut up and containerized along with all cleanup debris into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023061672
item.description:
Report X-2023061672

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-24
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking and removed from sortation, then brought to QA. DescribePack: Cap on bottle was cracked, no inner packing, no hazard labelling. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed right side up in a spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2023061662
item.description:
Report X-2023061662

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-21
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package taken out of system flow due to wet outer packaging. Upon inspection 1 9lb bottle of Clorox Germicidal Bleach Concentrate was found with a loose cap and leaking. Contents contained, Fedex procedures for damaged hazardous goods followed & awaiting disposition. DescribePack: 1 loose cap DurationRel: 48 and MitigateEffect: damaged contents separated from general population of non damaged parcels.

item.title: Report X-2023070445
item.description:
Report X-2023070445

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL ON SD2 IN DOOR. DONNED P.P.E. AND USED DECISION TREE. USED UNKNOWN RESPONSE SHEET. PH WAS 6 SO USED FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER CLEANED AND CONTAINERIZED THE LEAKER INTO SPILL TUB. THE LEAKER WAS NON-REGULATED ITEM. UPON REVIEWING REMAINING CONTENTS WITHIN THE PACKAGE, DISCOVERED TWO AEROSOL CANS. NO EXTERIOR MARKINGS. RESPONDER CONTACTED RMP WHO CALLED HMSC. THE HMSC DETERMINED IT WAS UNDECLARED. PROCESSING PACKAGE THROUGH ETT AS AN UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2023070314
item.description:
Report X-2023070314

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: BOBA TEA PEARLS LEAKED, AFFECTING THIS PACKAGE. WHEN RESPONDER WAS PROCESSING PACKAGE NOTICED BOX INSIDE BOX HAD LQ DIAMOND HAZARD PRINTED ON IT. NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR. LOOKING AT CONTENTS OF BOX AND FINDING APPROPRIATE SDS LED TO INDENTIFYING COMPLETE CAFE, UN1903 PG II. UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCESS STARTED.

item.title: Report X-2023061493
item.description:
Report X-2023061493

  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box found on side in trailer with wet stain. Box put in red tote and place upright. DescribePack: Items not facing upright which caused one bottle to be dented and leak from cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: items places upright and cap tightened.

item.title: Report X-2023061490
item.description:
Report X-2023061490

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: SALEM
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The powder was leaking out. The package was placed in a tote and brought to QA. QA inspected it. DescribePack: There was no packing material in the package to protect the items. There were no markings on the Outer package to indicate orientation or Hazardous material. the lid failed, allowing the powder to spill out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was inspected and the item was placed upright. The powder was cleaned up.

item.title: Report X-2023061487
item.description:
Report X-2023061487

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-17
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA leaking. Unsure what cause the damage. Leaking package was placed in hazmat bin. DescribePack: Outer packaging was not glued together well enough to hold inner packaging in place. Causing inner packaging to fall out and become damaged and leak from the caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: bottles were turned right side up to stop leaking, and pads used to clean up what spilled.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: package noticed to be stained and wet DescribePack: Inspection revealed inner jerrycan had loose air hole cap allowing liquid to leak. Product dissolved the glue of the safety seal under the loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in tote to contain leakage
